FuncDef: This command enables advertising the Multi-Exit Discriminator (MED) and assigns the value used for the path attribute for the MED advertised to BGP peers if the MED is not already set.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MED path attribute value, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 4294967295.
Specifies that the MED is set to the IGP cost of the given IP prefix.
